Author: Rad Geek People's Daily 2011-06-06 – Monday Lazy Linking
Comment: \[…\] Change the world. Phil, philwilson.org (2011-05-27). I work in Higher Education in the UK. Every day I see enterprisey systems which are awful, terrible, unfriendly, unusable, behemoths. The market for each niche system is more or less a monopoly. The market is prime for smaller, more agile, more user-friendly systems to come in and destroy them…. (Linked Sunday 2011-06-05.) \[…\]
